name: Shooting Mania
description:
hello people,

today i am back with Shooting Mania

(note that this game was made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3, the theme was "less is more")

in this game, you are given 3 gun choices, the rookie gun, the medium tier gun, the strongest gun. but of course where there r guns, there had to be hardships too.

soooooo if you choose a less powerful weapons, you have more health but it takes time to destroy the enemies, if you choose a medium tier gun, then you have half/normal health and it takes only some time to destroy the enemy. if  you choose a very powerful weapon. you have really low health but it takes really less time to destroy the enemy

to shoot the enemy, you have to left click the number of times it says on the screen.

for eg: if it says 2 clicks, you have to left click 2 times on the enemy in order to kill them 

have fun playing the game! :D

all feedbacks and suggestions are welcome :D

(this is my first 2D game, i make 3D games more)
